Date: Monday, 9/1/1977
Subject: Progress of Brian Harper
Dear Sir,
Brian Harper has nothing more to prove at A Miami Orioles!
He has an AVG of .289 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
